1_1LNroaTxHDoVxmh4noLEDGMTgUtovmyEAc.body:
> [tailorvj](#comment_2_1LNroaTxHDoVxmh4noLEDGMTgUtovmyEAc): hmmm, interesting. I would post a huge warning about this on every app running on proxy servers. It's a major security issue

I think it's kind of implied that when you use a proxy you don't really have any kind of privacy except for end to end encryption... You're asking someone to be a middle man, so you must trust the proxy for anything you would trust that middle man.
